channel.title: Valazar-PK 317 [UPDATED]
channel.description:
[center] [img]http://img689.imageshack.us/img689/3329/valazar.png[/img]
[img]http://img716.imageshack.us/img716/5959/playnowy.png[/img][url=http://www.valazar.com/playeco.php]Play Now![/url] [img]http://img42.imageshack.us/img42/1142/forumsb.png[/img][url=http://www.valazar.com/forums]Forums![/url]
Introduction: Welcome to the NEWLY founded Valazar, ladies and gentlemen, we have decided to switch to a whole new server for the long run of our times being online. We strive to do our best in which we listen to our fellow members of Valazar, and work our best to promote the best people for the job! Let us start with providing some media for everyone.
[size=18pt][b]Features:[/b][/size]
[ul][li]vBulletin software[/li] [li]Friendly overall community[/li] [li]Friendly staff members (we make sure of that)[/li] [li]Client enhancements (will provide below)[/li] [li]Medium EXP rates[/li] [li]Universal Client (Mac, Windows etc.)[/li][/ul] [size=18pt][b]Media:[/b][/size] [b]Valazar Client[/b] [img]http://screensnapr.com/e/vJEqmT.png[/img] [b]Valazar Login Point:[/b] [img]http://puu.sh/15JMS/8a8ae61a353cb912b2280b3906f92346[/img] [b]Starter with a special one-week time cape (Legends cape):[/b] [img]http://puu.sh/15K4v/c29ef5a1ff485a231e862e61562c3e25[/img] [b]Client enhancement features:[/b] [img]http://puu.sh/15K69/aa634f6216fbec9b0b4d2c136dae3d55[/img] [b]Client enhancement features (2):[/b] [img]http://puu.sh/15K72/80d3d5219ef4ae2a5ba887279ed61d8e[/img] [b]Valazar Login Interface:[/b] [img]http://puu.sh/15Kb1/0767f6b936cd9b816c07c83dae7279a8[/img] [b]NPC Clipping:[/b] [img]http://puu.sh/15KeA/4b464f8449b789def7723d70decf7351[/img] [b]Quest Tab Information:[/b] [img]http://screensnapr.com/e/OKGjEA.png[/img] [/center] Thank You,
Valazar Administration Team

@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

The entire advertisement thread has been updated with our newest server content! Let me know what else I could add as I’m not too bright on making them.

item.title: Valazar-PK 317 [UPDATED]
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Good news!

After a discussion of it seemed hours, we’ve decided to ditch the PvP server now! The best part about this is that we SHOULD have the server online (with the PvP server going offline after, not sure what to do with it at the moment) tomorrow. With this in mind, I’ll be posting screenshots and doing a little bit of this advertisement thread over sometime tomorrow.

Read full topic

item.title: Valazar-PK 317 [UPDATED]
item.dc:creator: @eclipse_rsps eclipse rsps
item.description:
@eclipse_rsps wrote:

[quote=“tyb97, post:14, topic:459454”][quote author=eclipse rsps link=topic=562368.msg4100645#msg4100645 date=1347412422]

I love how everyone is so intimidated by Soulcist… If you got to say it, make it blunt as you can, ex: “IT LOOKS LIKE SHIT.”

Question, what about those that like to skill and enjoy a good economy? I see a server heavly influenced by Pk’ing, which I do not do. Whats in it for us?

i wouldnt say im intimidated, i just dont want to be an ass.
[/quote]
If this were some first time poster you would have used a much different context.[/quote]
Cuz i know soulcist more then a first time poster

Read full topic

item.title: Valazar-PK 317 [UPDATED]
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

You should really save the images in a PNG format, that way they come out nicely. I hate everything that’s low-quality. Other than that, it looks good.

item.title: Valazar-PK 317 [UPDATED]
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“Soulcist, post:8, topic:459454”][quote author=Fails link=topic=562368.msg4100563#msg4100563 date=1347405964]
After I complete my studies, I am going to play this.

What do you plan on doing in the future? Or is it secretive? :eek:
[/quote]
It’s explained in the introduction thread, I meant as far as what we intend to do once we plan out our player-base.

No offense my Soulcist bro, but I don’t see anything different than Vistex. Please explain.

But, I do love how you explain your server, your layout, and your advertisement!

You are correct darling, this is indeed Vistex, and I don’t doubt that. Though, I do wish (if I had the power to do so) that I could use another base, however, this is NOT our official server, this is so we can gain our player-base (he has been doing some more programming, and doing what he can), and then once we’ve stabilized our community as a whole (we’ve merged two communities within our grasps), we’re going to take forth the effort to make the economy server (our soon to be official) the best Jordon and the rest of the team can make it.

Oh and credits to one of our fellow members for help making this advertisement: Nope is Dope[/quote]
Oh. I’m like, “Soulcist so pro bro.”

Good luck haha. I’m sure to get on sometime in 10 minutes

Read full topic

item.title: Valazar-PK 317 [UPDATED]
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

[quote=“Fails, post:6, topic:459454”]After I complete my studies, I am going to play this.

What do you plan on doing in the future? Or is it secretive? :eek:[/quote]
It’s explained in the introduction thread, I meant as far as what we intend to do once we plan out our player-base.

[quote=“arham 4, post:7, topic:459454”]No offense my Soulcist bro, but I don’t see anything different than Vistex. Please explain.

But, I do love how you explain your server, your layout, and your advertisement![/quote]
You are correct darling, this is indeed Vistex, and I don’t doubt that. Though, I do wish (if I had the power to do so) that I could use another base, however, this is NOT our official server, this is so we can gain our player-base (he has been doing some more programming, and doing what he can), and then once we’ve stabilized our community as a whole (we’ve merged two communities within our grasps), we’re going to take forth the effort to make the economy server (our soon to be official) the best Jordon and the rest of the team can make it.

Oh and credits to one of our fellow members for help making this advertisement: Nope is Dope

Read full topic

item.title: Valazar-PK 317 [UPDATED]
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

RiiPiiNFtW:

Server is awesome. I helped for a short time a while ago. But EW! The owner crown is ugly. :L

Yes, the crown is quite hideous, trust me, it bothers me as well, I’m going to see what Jordon has in mind with doing with it.

I’ve added an ‘introduction’ part of the advertisement explaining the reason for using a PK server, our future, and what we plan on doing!

Read full topic

Introduction:
Welcome to the NEWLY founded Valazar, ladies and gentlemen, we have decided to switch to a whole new server for the long run of our times being online. We strive to do our best in which we listen to our fellow members of Valazar, and work our best to promote the best people for the job! Let us start with providing some media for everyone.

[size=18pt]Features:[/size]
